name: New Mystery Hidden Objects
description:
Mystery Hidden Objects Game is Totally free and Our Other games are also free.!!!!!

Mystery Hidden Objects a fun seek and find objects hunting game that challenges.

you Can Find of different Objects one by one.

Picture stages give you images of the items you need to find, making it easy to complete challenges by matching item to item.

You never know what mystery will happen next in this Mystery Hidden Objects Game full of numerous little objects to search and make it one of the best finding objects games.

It is a very challenging and addicting find hidden objects full of entertainment for both kids and adults.

So are you ready to locate and find all the lost objects in this free hidden object game while discovering concealed hidden secrets?

Uncover the mystery, detect and spot the concealed hidden objects. Can you find all the missing concealed objects in each colourful stage?

And also You Can use hint and find the objects.

FEATURES of Mystery Hidden Objects:
-- 15+ Different levels
-- 20 Objects Per Level
-- 300 Objects to Find
-- Cannot find a missing item? Use some hints to particle it
-- All that for completely FREE and without any in-app purchases
-- A level map that remembers progress and high scores
-- Great sound effects that can be toggled on/off
